messages.subject: still have lots to learn
messages.msgSnippet: ... feel like there is a lot for me to learn. Well, I am 53 and still feel like I can never grasp all, in this lifetime, that I wish I could! . . . it is a
messages.messageBody:
> I am 34 and still
feel like there is a lot for me to learn.


Well, I am 53 and still feel like I can never grasp all, in this lifetime,
that I wish I could! . . . it is a constant work in progress . . .
parenting is the most complex and rewarding task on my personal path - and
I am grateful for all those who have helped me along the way . .. including
those on this treasured list.
Aloha,
Lee
Mom to Sky 19, Nell 16 and Bay 12 - who are my finest companions and
teachers on this path.
North Country Farms
